awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  Hydraulic Forming    Simulator and Tester
awd_abstract_narration: The requested equipment consists of a specially-designed,                  double-action, hydraulically-actuated machine that is suitable for              a variety of mechanical tests related to material forming                       operations.  The precise position sensors and special computer                  control technology can produce a variety of operating schedules,                thereby allowing the Hydraulic Forming Simulator to emulate many                kinds of standard testing machines, industrial presses, and other               mechanical devices while precisely controlling and recording loads,             rates, and positions.  The Hydraulic Forming Simulator will be used             by researchers involved in sheet forming, forging, polymer and                  composite forming, and material testing.  Its flexible design                   insures that it can serve for many years as a state-of-the-art                  mechanical testing platform for forming research.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
